summary: Design-focused project aiming for a luxury, rich-person aesthetic with sparkly elements while remaining child-friendly.
known_issues: Current design does not read as 'rich/luxury' enough; missing sparkly/premium cues.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Seamless soft gold sparkle/glitter texture with tiny star specks on transparent background (sparkle-overlay-seamless.dim_1024x1024.png)
- Corner starburst/shine accent set (4 variations) on transparent background (sparkle-corners-set.dim_1024x1024.png)
- Subtle bokeh + glitter gradient haze on transparent background (glitter-haze-overlay.dim_1920x1080.png)

existing_features.title: Add a consistent, app-wide “sparkly luxury” visual layer that makes the UI feel noticeably more wealthy/premium while remaining child-friendly (e.g., subtle sparkle/glitter highlights, starbursts, and warm gold shimmer accents) without reducing readability.

Implement reusable “sparkle” styling utilities (CSS/Tailwind utilities and/or a small reusable React overlay component) and apply them to existing luxury surfaces (e.g., .luxury-gradient, .luxury-card, .luxury-surface) so sparkles appear consistently across the app instead of only on isolated icons.

Keep animations and effects child-friendly and accessible: respect reduced-motion preferences and ensure sparkle animations are subtle (no rapid flashing) and do not negatively impact performance on typical devices.

Add generated static sparkle/glitter visual assets and use them as overlays/background textures (served from frontend/public/assets/generated) to reinforce the rich-person aesthetic across key screens.

new_feature_requests.summary: Enhance visuals to feel more luxurious/wealthy with sparkles and premium styling cues
Adjust design to be more child-friendly (playful elements) while keeping luxury feel

projectName: Add sparkly luxury styling while keeping the UI child-friendly
